page.title: 15Some Dinas Dads' Jobs
page.content: We are 15 children in our class.Our ages range from 7-9. We are ten boys and five girls. Sophie,Gareth Watson and Diane's dad are{farmers.}Rhidian's dad works part time on the Sealink engines and part time on his small holding.Lisa's dad is an{architect.}Simon's dad is a {market gardener.}Georgina's dad is a {teacher. Anna and David's dads are both {carpenters.}Gareth Phillips,Kevin and Christopher's dads are all in the {building trade.}Gareth Curtis' dad is a{marine merchant}and Huw's dad is a {dog-breeder. Christopher and David's dads are unemployed.
